alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 16 at 3:04PM MST until December 16 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 7 PM for gusty winds and low humidity for fire weather zones 229, 230, and 233, which includes Huerfano county and the lower elevations of Las Animas County... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229...230 AND 233... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 229...230 and 233. * Winds...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts... Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
